help.title: Help
help.helpItem1: To delete all complete notes, press the button
help.helpItem2: To clear all data cache, press the button
help.helpItem3: One click on the note to expand
help.helpItem4: Double click on the note to edit
help.helpItem5: To manage the tabs, click the button
help.helpItem6: To add new tab, click the button
help.helpItem7: To change name of a the tab or note, tap the name.
